titleStmt.title: Anacreon done into English out of the original Greek
Anacreontea. English.
titleStmt.author: Anacreon.
Willis, Francis, b. 1663 or 4.
Cowley, Abraham, 1618-1667.
Oldham, John, 1653-1683.
Wood, Thomas, 1661-1722.
S. B.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L. Lichfield ... for Anthony Stephens ...,

notesStmt.note: Preface signed: S.B. [i.e. Francis Willis, Abraham Cowley, John Oldham, and Thomas Wood, translators]. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
First ed. of this translation. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
